Title: The Internet
Writer: Benjamin Bocquelet (creator), Benjamin Bocquelet, Yann Benedi, Guillaume Cassuto, Antoine Perez, Jon Foster, James Lamont, Tobi Wilson
Actors: Logan Grove, Kwesi Boakye, Kyla Rae Kowalewski, Teresa Gallagher
Plot: Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself, and then demands The Internet take it down.
